definition: The boundless vista is at the perilous peak (proverb)/fig. exhilaration follows a hard-won victory
pinyin: wu2 xian4 feng1 guang1 zai4 xian3 feng1

sentences.english: Entirely devoted to the Party, the young soldier gave his life for his country.
sentences.chinese: 對黨無限忠誠，這位年輕的士兵爲祖國獻出了生命。

sentences.english: Yet the timeless in you is aware of life's timelessness
sentences.chinese: 然而你們心中的無限，意識到生命的無限。

sentences.english: Yet the timeless in you is aware of life's timelessness
sentences.chinese: 然而你們心中的無限，意識到生命的無限。

sentences.english: And on those keys, the music that you can make is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 由鍵盤編織的音樂纔是無限的。

sentences.english: Think of the endless opportunity our connectedness provides.
sentences.chinese: 想想我們當今社會的連通性給我們所帶來的無限機遇。

sentences.english: These two poems help me to further comprehend limitless oneness .
sentences.chinese: 這兩首詩令我對無限的一體有更進一步的體認。

sentences.english: He was always loyal to the Party.
Others seek out the unlimited opportunities this type of self-sufficient livelihood can provide.
sentences.chinese: 別人找機遇這種無限自足的生活可以提供。

sentences.english: A model and its formula of 3-D 10-node mapped infinite element for intercalations in rock engineering are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出三維10結點映射夾層無限元模型及相應算式。

sentences.english: We study the unstable autoregressive process for the first order with infinite variance.
sentences.chinese: 對具有無限方差的一階自迴歸非平穩過程進行了研究。

sentences.english: Strange to say, the infinite suffices them.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的是，他們滿足於無限的太空。

sentences.english: Then the mind itself has become the measureless.
sentences.chinese: 那時心靈本身就變成了那無限。

sentences.english: If a blank white screen feels like infinite potential to you, you're not alone.
sentences.chinese: 或許你像我一樣覺得新頁面裏充滿無限可能吧。

sentences.english: Finally, an AD can bring unlimited business opportunities for the night and a large consumer.
sentences.chinese: 最後，廣告可以爲起夜帶來無限商機和年夜量消費者。

sentences.english: Barefaced attitude is exceeding and ambiguous fetching illusion is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 露骨的姿態極度曖昧引人幻想無限。

sentences.english: They treasure their leisure with measureless pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 他們以無限的快樂珍惜他們的閒暇時間。

definition: space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
